pr_title: Fix failure during running uber jar

timeline.bodyText: We don't need this section anymore with jdk 11?
timeline.author: Kishanthan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,12 +2,3 @@
 org-name = "ballerina"
 version = "0.9.0"
 
-[platform]
-target = "java8"
-
-    [[platform.libraries]]
-    artifactId = "java"
-    version = "0.9.0"
-    path = "./lib/ballerina-java-0.9.0-java.jar"
-    groupId = "ballerina"
-    modules = ["java"]

replies.bodyText: It is not there in any of the lang toml files. They are there in stdlib toml files only
replies.author: riyafa

timeline.message:
Fix failure during running uber jar

Add the ballerina-java gradle module to rt jar to fix the failure during running the uber-jar
Resolve https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/26235

Rename ballerina-java gradle module to ballerina-lang:java

This is to be consistent with other langlib modules

Rename ballerina-java gradle module to ballerina-lang:java

This is to be consistent with other langlib modules
